subject: Automobile Racing
Automobiles
lead_paragraph: SÃO PAULO, Brazil, Oct. 21 (AP) — Kimi Raikkonen won the Brazilian Grand Prix on Sunday to capture the Formula One title in the tightest race for the championship in 21 years.
